channel.title: How do i make a portal.... take me somewhere?
channel.description:
ok,,,,
can anyone please tell me how to make a portal take you somewhere?
like from jad to home tele?
thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2007, 09:16:42 PM[/size][hr]sorry for the double post but i really need help!

item.title: How do i make a portal.... take me somewhere?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

sorry i explained it well look it over 4153 is the PORTAL ID… and objects.cfg spawns portals in game if your base dones’t use objects.cfg you have to add GLOBAL objects using java coding methos for this is named

placeGlobalObject(X,Y,OBJECTID,TYPE,HEIGHT);

the case goes in parseIncomingPackets unless it exists (it does… add to old case same number)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a portal.... take me somewhere?

item.source: How do i make a portal.... take me somewhere?

item.title: How do i make a portal.... take me somewhere?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

my portals uses…

objects.cfg inside is
//-------posX—posY-----ID----face----type—Height
object = 3235 3220 4153 0 10 0
object = 3235 3219 4154 0 10 0

packetFrame for portals is 132 used when you click a object

than u just code a If statement in your game for 4153 4154 etc… since there is tons of portals u can use a bunch of em and ID em by ID’s but better to ID em by coordinates.

example…

case 132:
int objectX = c.inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
int objectID = c.inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int objectY = c.inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

if(objectID == 4153) {
teleportToX = 2772;
teleportToY = 10231;
}

etc…

Read full topic
